name: JobTest
description: jobtest.org - to empower people and help them make informed career decisions. It’s never too late to find fulfillment in your work, and you don’t need to be a high school student to think about this. In fact, more than 50% of Americans change their careers before retirement - and so did many of us on our team.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Find a career that lights your fire
ShortDescription: We are a team of recruiters, tech entrepreneurs, data scientists, and HR professionals gathered together with a common goal of empowering people.

Highlights.name: 98% Satisfaction Rate
Highlights.description: Over 98% of users have indicated that they are satisfied with the results.

Highlights.name: Improvement Through Feedback
Highlights.description: We believe in continuous improvement. Please drop us a note at support@jobtest.org whenever you have feedback for us

Highlights.name: Love for Humanity
Highlights.description: Empowering people to be successful in their career and in their life is our no. 1 priority. This is heavily rooted in our love for humanity.

enhanced_description: JobTest, operating as jobtest.org, is an HR technology solution designed to empower individuals and help them make informed career decisions, fostering fulfillment in their work. It supports career changers and those seeking to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency. The platform offers an AI-powered test for assessment, provides test-based job opportunities, and delivers career coaching. Rooted in a mission of 'Love for Humanity' and backed by a team of recruiters, tech entrepreneurs, data scientists, and HR professionals, JobTest aims for continuous improvement, evidenced by a 98% user satisfaction rate. It falls under the Learning and Development category, with sub-categories including Course authoring and Corporate LMS functionality.
key_use_cases: Employee Learning and Development within an Organizational Context
competitive_advantages: Team expertise comprising recruiters, tech entrepreneurs, data scientists, and HR professionals
primary_users: Individuals seeking career guidance or change
